name: Travelers' Feast
flavorText: Food for your entire group materializes out of the air, enough to sustain you through a long dayâ€™s march.
text: You create food and water, enough to feed five Medium or Small creatures or two Large creatures for 24 hours. You designate the type of eaters when performing the ritual, and the ritual creates appropriate food (trail rations for people, grain for horses, and so on).  Any food or water created but uneaten disappears at the end of the duration.
